</style><script>
(function () {
  let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1024 ? 'des' : 'mob';

  const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
  const interaccion = "int";

  const flujo = "DX"; // DX || NBF
  const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

  const numScript = "[PER-LastSearchMobile]";

  if (type == 0) console.log(numScript, "Control");
  if (type == 1) console.log(numScript, "Experiencia");
  if (type == 2) console.log(numScript, "Version C");

  setTimeout(() => {

    let getLastSearchData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('lastSearchMobile'));
    let data = {};
    const sitePath = window.location.pathname;
    const getPointOfSale = sitePath.split('/');
    let setPoinfOfSale = getPointOfSale[1].toUpperCase();
    const siteLanguage = getPointOfSale[2].toUpperCase();

    // Position[0] from desktop - Position[1] for mobile
    const roundTripRadioButton = document.querySelectorAll('#radioIdayVuelta');
    const oneWayTripRadioButton = document.querySelectorAll('#radioSoloIda');

    const originInput = document.getElementsByName('pbOrigen_1_')[0];
    const originAirportLabel = document.getElementsByName('pbOrigen_1_')[0].nextElementSibling;

    const destinationInput = document.getElementsByName('pbDestino_1_')[0];
    const destinationAirportLabel = document.getElementsByName('pbDestino_1_')[0].nextElementSibling;

    const departureDateInput = document.querySelector('#fechasIdaIntegrada');
    const returnDateInput = document.querySelector('#fechasRegInt');

    const searchFlightBtn = document.querySelector('#iniciaFlujo');

    if(device === 'mob' && (siteLanguage === 'ES' || siteLanguage === 'EN')) {
      const setVuelo = () => {
        let existingData = getLastSearchData;
        let dataIndex = 0;
        
        let departureDate = '';
        let returnDate = '';

        // Position[0] = adults - Position[1] = childs - Position[2] = infants
        const passengersModal = document.querySelectorAll('.passenger.pass-mobile .value.x-mvvm');

        const getDate = document.querySelectorAll('.day.day-normal.day-selected');

        let adultsQty = passengersModal[0].innerText;
        let childsQty = passengersModal[1].innerText;
        let infantsQty = passengersModal[2].innerText;

        let totalPassengers = +adultsQty + +childsQty + +infantsQty;

        if(existingData === null) {
          existingData = [];
        } else if (existingData.length > 0) {
          if (existingData[0].index === 0) {
            dataIndex = 1;
          }
          dataIndex;
        }

        if(roundTripRadioButton[1].checked && originInput.value !== '' && destinationInput.value !== '' && departureDateInput.value !== '' && returnDateInput.value !== '') {
          departureDate = getDate[0].getAttribute('data-day');
          returnDate = getDate[1].getAttribute('data-day');

          data = {
            'index': dataIndex,
            'ciudadOrigen': originInput.value,
            'aeropuertoOrigen' :originAirportLabel.value,
            'ciudadDestino': destinationInput.value,
            'aeropuertoDestino' : destinationAirportLabel.value,
            'fechaSalida': departureDate,
            'fechaRegreso': returnDate,
            'cantAdults': +adultsQty,
            'cantChilds': +childsQty,
            'cantInfants': +infantsQty,
            'cantTotal': totalPassengers,
          }

          existingData.unshift(data);
      
          if(existingData.length > 2) {
            existingData.pop();
          }

          localStorage.setItem('lastSearchMobile', JSON.stringify(existingData));
        }

        if(oneWayTripRadioButton[1].checked && originInput.value !== '' && destinationInput.value !== '' && departureDateInput.value !== '') {
          departureDate = getDate[0].getAttribute('data-day');

          data = {
            'index': dataIndex,
            'ciudadOrigen': originInput.value,
            'aeropuertoOrigen' :originAirportLabel.value,
            'ciudadDestino': destinationInput.value,
            'aeropuertoDestino' : destinationAirportLabel.value,
            'fechaSalida': departureDate,
            'cantAdults': +adultsQty,
            'cantChilds': +childsQty,
            'cantInfants': +infantsQty,
            'cantTotal': totalPassengers,
          }

          existingData.unshift(data);
      
          if(existingData.length > 2) {
            existingData.pop();
          }

          localStorage.setItem('lastSearchMobile', JSON.stringify(existingData));
        }

      }

      searchFlightBtn.addEventListener('click', setVuelo);

      setTimeout(() => {
        if(getLastSearchData && getLastSearchData.length > 0) {
          const searchURL = 'https://booking.avianca.com/av/booking/avail';
    
          const lastSearchTitle = document.createElement('h5');
          lastSearchTitle.classList.add('last-search-title-mobile');
          if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
            lastSearchTitle.innerText = 'Tus últimas búsquedas:';
          }
          if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
            lastSearchTitle.innerText = 'Your last searches:';
          }
    
          document.querySelector('.content-overlay-booking').appendChild(lastSearchTitle);
          
          const lastSearchContainer = document.createElement('article');
          lastSearchContainer.classList.add('last-search-mobile-container');
    
          let monthsES = '';
          let monthsEN = '';
    
          const months = {
            "1": "01",
            "2": "02",
            "3": "03",
            "4": "04",
            "5": "05",
            "6": "06",
            "7": "07",
            "8": "08",
            "9": "09",
            "10": "10",
            "11": "11",
            "12": "12",
          }
    
          if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
            monthsES = {
              "1": "ene",
              "2": "feb",
              "3": "mar",
              "4": "abr",
              "5": "may",
              "6": "jun",
              "7": "jul",
              "8": "ago",
              "9": "sep",
              "10": "oct",
              "11": "nov",
              "12": "dic",
            }
          }
    
          if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
            monthsEN = {
              "1": "jan",
              "2": "feb",
              "3": "mar",
              "4": "apr",
              "5": "may",
              "6": "jun",
              "7": "jul",
              "8": "aug",
              "9": "sep",
              "10": "oct",
              "11": "nov",
              "12": "dec",
            }
          }

          const currentDate = new Date();
          currentDate.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);

          const getNumberOfDays = (start, end) => {
            const date1 = new Date(start);
            const date2 = new Date(end);
        
            // One day in milliseconds
            const oneDay = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
        
            // Calculating the time difference between two dates
            const diffInTime = date2.getTime() - date1.getTime();
        
            // Calculating the no. of days between two dates
            const diffInDays = Math.round(diffInTime / oneDay);
        
            return diffInDays;
          }

          // Add X days to a date
          Date.prototype.addDays = function (days) {
            const date = new Date(this.valueOf());
            date.setDate(date.getDate() + days);
            return date;
          }
    
          getLastSearchData.forEach((el) => {
            /*if(setPoinfOfSale === 'OTR' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'NI' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'BO' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'DO' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'GT' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'PA' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'UY' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'SV' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'HN' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'PY' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'CL' ||
              setPoinfOfSale === 'PE'
              ) {
              setPoinfOfSale = 'US';
            }*/

            let getDepartureDate = '';
            let departureYear = '';
            let departureMonth = '';
            let departureDay = '';
            let departureDate = '';

            let dateOfReturn = '';
            let getReturnDate = '';
            let returnYear = '';
            let returnMonth = '';
            let returnDay = '';
            let returnDate = '';
    
            let searchURLQuery = '';

            if(el.fechaRegreso) {
              dateOfReturn = new Date(el.fechaRegreso);
            }

            // Validate if a date is a past date and add 7 days to it
            if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, el.fechaSalida) < 0 && getNumberOfDays(currentDate, dateOfReturn) < 1 ) {
              let updateDepartureDate = currentDate.addDays(7);
              updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.toLocaleDateString();
              updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.split('/');
              departureYear = updateDepartureDate[2];
              departureMonth = updateDepartureDate[1];
              departureDay = updateDepartureDate[0];
              if(departureDay.length === 1) {
                departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
              }
              departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
            } else if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, el.fechaSalida) < 0) {
              let updateDepartureDate = currentDate;
              updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.toLocaleDateString();
              updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.split('/');
              departureYear = updateDepartureDate[2];
              departureMonth = updateDepartureDate[1];
              departureDay = updateDepartureDate[0];
              if(departureDay.length === 1) {
                departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
              }
              departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
            } else {
              getDepartureDate = el.fechaSalida.split('.');
              departureYear = getDepartureDate[0];
              departureMonth = getDepartureDate[1];
              departureDay = getDepartureDate[2];
              if(departureDay.length === 1) {
                departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
              }
              departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
            }

            if(!el.fechaRegreso) {
              if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, el.fechaSalida) < 0) {
                let updateDepartureDate = currentDate.addDays(7);
                updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.toLocaleDateString();
                updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.split('/');
                departureYear = updateDepartureDate[2];
                departureMonth = updateDepartureDate[1];
                departureDay = updateDepartureDate[0];
                if(departureDay.length === 1) {
                  departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
                }
                departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
              }
              searchURLQuery = '?departureDate=' + departureDate + '&tripType=one-way&from=' + el.aeropuertoOrigen + '&to=' + el.aeropuertoDestino+ '&nbAdults=' + el.cantAdults + '&nbChildren=' +el.cantChilds + '&nbInfants=' + el.cantInfants + '&language=' + siteLanguage + '&platform=WEBB2C&pointOfSale=' + setPoinfOfSale + '&promoCode=&negoFare=&overrides=%7B%22enableFlexCancelTeaser%22:%22true%22,%22useHPP%22:%22true%22%7D&accessMethod=default&backend=PRD';
            } else {
              if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, dateOfReturn) < 1) {
                let updateReturnDate = currentDate.addDays(14);
                updateReturnDate = updateReturnDate.toLocaleDateString();
                updateReturnDate = updateReturnDate.split('/');
                returnYear = updateReturnDate[2];
                returnMonth = updateReturnDate[1];
                returnDay = updateReturnDate[0];
                if(returnDay.length === 1) {
                  returnDay = '0' + returnDay;
                }
                returnDate = returnYear + '-' + months[returnMonth] + '-' + returnDay;
        
                searchURLQuery = '?departureDate=' + departureDate + '&tripType=round-trip&from=' + el.aeropuertoOrigen + '&to=' + el.aeropuertoDestino+ '&nbAdults=' + el.cantAdults + '&nbChildren=' +el.cantChilds + '&nbInfants=' + el.cantInfants + '&language=' + siteLanguage + '&platform=WEBB2C&pointOfSale=' + setPoinfOfSale + '&returnDate=' + returnDate + '&promoCode=&negoFare=&overrides=%7B%22enableFlexCancelTeaser%22:%22true%22,%22useHPP%22:%22true%22%7D&accessMethod=default&backend=PRD';
              } else {
                getReturnDate = el.fechaRegreso.split('.');
                returnYear = getReturnDate[0];
                returnMonth = getReturnDate[1];
                returnDay = getReturnDate[2];
                if(returnDay.length === 1) {
                  returnDay = '0' + returnDay;
                }
                returnDate = returnYear + '-' + months[returnMonth] + '-' + returnDay;
        
                searchURLQuery = '?departureDate=' + departureDate + '&tripType=round-trip&from=' + el.aeropuertoOrigen + '&to=' + el.aeropuertoDestino+ '&nbAdults=' + el.cantAdults + '&nbChildren=' +el.cantChilds + '&nbInfants=' + el.cantInfants + '&language=' + siteLanguage + '&platform=WEBB2C&pointOfSale=' + setPoinfOfSale + '&returnDate=' + returnDate + '&promoCode=&negoFare=&overrides=%7B%22enableFlexCancelTeaser%22:%22true%22,%22useHPP%22:%22true%22%7D&accessMethod=default&backend=PRD';
              }
            }
    
            const htmlCard = document.createElement('div');
            const cardFlightDetails = document.createElement('a');
            const lastSearchIcon = document.createElement('p');
            const flyingData = document.createElement('div');
            const flyingCities = document.createElement('p');
            const flyingDates = document.createElement('p');
            const numPassengers = document.createElement('span');
            const passengersIcon = document.createElement('span');
            const deleteFligthIcon = document.createElement('p');
    
            htmlCard.setAttribute('id', 'htmlCard-mobile'+el.index );
            htmlCard.classList.add('last-search-card-mobile');
    
            cardFlightDetails.setAttribute('href', searchURL+searchURLQuery );
            cardFlightDetails.setAttribute('role', 'link' );
            cardFlightDetails.classList.add('flight-details-mobile');
    
            lastSearchIcon.classList.add('last-search-icon-mobile');
            lastSearchIcon.innerHTML = '<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="22" height="22" id="Capa_1" viewBox="0 0 21 18"><defs><style>.cls-1{fill:#505055;fill-rule:evenodd;}</style></defs><path class="cls-1" d="M12,0C7.03,0,3,4.03,3,9H0l3.89,3.89,.07,.14,4.04-4.03h-3c0-3.87,3.13-7,7-7s7,3.13,7,7-3.13,7-7,7c-1.93,0-3.68-.79-4.94-2.06l-1.42,1.42c1.63,1.63,3.87,2.64,6.36,2.64,4.97,0,9-4.03,9-9S16.97,0,12,0Zm-1,5v5l4.28,2.54,.72-1.21-3.5-2.08V5h-1.5Z"></path></svg>';
    
            flyingData.classList.add('flying-data-mobile');
    
            flyingCities.classList.add('flying-cities-mobile');
            flyingCities.innerText = el.ciudadOrigen + ' - ' + el.ciudadDestino;
    
            flyingDates.classList.add('flying-dates-mobile');
            if(!el.fechaRegreso) {
              if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
                flyingDates.innerText = departureDay + ' ' + monthsES[departureMonth];
              }
              if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
                flyingDates.innerText = monthsEN[departureMonth] + ' ' + departureDay;
              }
            } else {
              if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
                flyingDates.innerText = departureDay + ' ' + monthsES[departureMonth] + ' - ' + returnDay + ' ' + monthsES[returnMonth];
              }
              if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
                flyingDates.innerText = monthsEN[departureMonth] + ' ' + departureDay + ' - ' + monthsEN[returnMonth] + ' ' + returnDay;
              }
            }
    
            numPassengers.classList.add('number-passengers-mobile');
            numPassengers.innerText = el.cantTotal;
    
            passengersIcon.classList.add('passengers-icon-mobile');
            passengersIcon.innerHTML = '<svg width="16" height="18" viewBox="0 0 16 9" fill="#505055" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M8 8a2.667 2.667 0 1 0 0-5.333A2.667 2.667 0 0 0 8 8zm0 1.333c-1.78 0-5.333.894-5.333 2.667v1.333h10.666V12c0-1.773-3.553-2.667-5.333-2.667z" fill="#505055"></path></svg>';
    
            deleteFligthIcon.classList.add('delete-flight-icon-mobile');
            deleteFligthIcon.innerHTML = '<svg style="pointer-events: none" width="22" height="22" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="#505055" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="m12.667 4.273-.94-.94L8 7.06 4.274 3.333l-.94.94L7.06 8l-3.726 3.727.94.94L8 8.94l3.727 3.727.94-.94L8.94 8l3.727-3.727z" fill="#505055"></path><mask id="a" style="mask-type:alpha" maskUnits="userSpaceOnUse" x="3" y="3" width="10" height="10"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="m12.667 4.273-.94-.94L8 7.06 4.274 3.333l-.94.94L7.06 8l-3.726 3.727.94.94L8 8.94l3.727 3.727.94-.94L8.94 8l3.727-3.727z" fill="#fff"></path></mask></svg>'
            
            flyingDates.appendChild(numPassengers);
            flyingDates.appendChild(passengersIcon);
            flyingData.appendChild(flyingCities);
            flyingData.appendChild(flyingDates);
            cardFlightDetails.appendChild(lastSearchIcon);
            cardFlightDetails.appendChild(flyingData);
            
            htmlCard.appendChild(cardFlightDetails);
            htmlCard.appendChild(deleteFligthIcon);
    
            lastSearchContainer.appendChild(htmlCard);
            document.querySelector('.content-overlay-booking').appendChild(lastSearchContainer);
          })
    
          const deleteBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.delete-flight-icon-mobile');
          deleteBtns.forEach(function(el) {
            if(!el.classList.contains('cro-assigned')) {
              el.classList.add('cro-assigned');
              el.addEventListener('click', function(el) {
                trackEvents('last-search-close-click');
                el.target.parentNode.style.display = 'none';
                getLastSearchData = getLastSearchData.filter(data => ('htmlCard-mobile'+data.index) !== el.target.parentNode.id)
                localStorage.setItem('lastSearchMobile', JSON.stringify(getLastSearchData));
      
                if(getLastSearchData.length === 0) {
                  document.querySelector('.last-search-title-mobile').remove();
                }
              })
            }
          })
    
          document.querySelectorAll('.flight-details-mobile').forEach(card => {
            if(!card.classList.contains('cro-assigned')){
              card.classList.add('cro-assigned');
              card.addEventListener('click', (el) => {
                trackEvents('last-search-item-click');
                el.stopPropagation();
              })
            }
          })
    
          let cantLastFlightContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.last-search-mobile-container');
          if(cantLastFlightContainers.length > 1) {
            cantLastFlightContainers[1].remove();
          }
    
          let cantLastSearchTitles = document.querySelectorAll('.last-search-title-mobile');
          if(cantLastSearchTitles.length > 1) {
            cantLastSearchTitles[1].remove();
          }
        }
      }, 1000)
    }

  }, 1000)
  
  const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
    const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_464190_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_464190_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "464190", "audienceReport_464190": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };

    try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
    try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
  }
  
})();

    @media screen and (min-width: 1025px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {}

    (function () {

        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';

        const flujo = "NBF"; // DX
        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

        const numScript = "[FB101]";



        const pages = {
            availabilityNbfOB: "availability-nbfob",
            availabilityNbfIB: "availability-nbfib",
            availabilityNbfCONF: "availability-nbfconf",
            passengerNbfPAX: "passenger-nbfpax",
            ancillariesNbfASS: "ancillary-nbfaas",
            farereviewNbfFare: "farereview-nbffare",
            pagosNbfPAY: "pagos-nbfpay",
            confirmationNbfConf: "confirmation-nbfconf"
        }

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].getAttribute("data-template-name")) {
                    console.log(numScript);
                    
                    modifyPage();

                    setTimeout(()=>{
                        modifyPage();
                    }, 1000);

                    setTimeout(()=>{
                        modifyPage();
                    }, 2000);

                    setTimeout(()=>{
                        modifyPage();
                    }, 3000);

                    setTimeout(()=>{
                        modifyPage();
                    }, 5000);

                    setTimeout(()=>{
                        modifyPage();
                    }, 7000);

                }
                else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                    console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const modifyPage = () => {
            let page = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0].getAttribute("data-template-name");
            if (page === "RFPOW" || page === "RFPC") {
                let lang = document.getElementsByTagName("html")[0].getAttribute("lang");
                let desk = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1023;
                let mobile = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth <= 1022;

                let TextS = {
                    es: "Hasta 3 LifeMiles por cada USD",
                    en: "Up to 3 LifeMiles per each USD",
                    pt: "Até 3 LifeMiles por cada USD"
                }
                let TextM = {
                    es: "Hasta 5 LifeMiles por cada USD",
                    en: "Up to 5 LifeMiles per each USD",
                    pt: "Até 5 LifeMiles por cada USD"
                }
                let TextL = {
                    es: "Hasta 7 LifeMiles por cada USD",
                    en: "Up to 7 LifeMiles per each USD",
                    pt: "Até 7 LifeMiles por cada USD"
                }
                let TextXL = {
                    es: "Hasta 5 LifeMiles por cada USD",
                    en: "Up to 5 LifeMiles per each USD",
                    pt: "Até 5 LifeMiles por cada USD"
                }
                let TextXXL = {
                    es: "Hasta 7 LifeMiles por cada USD",
                    en: "Up to 7 LifeMiles per each USD",
                    pt: "Até 7 LifeMiles por cada USD"
                }

                function TallasEconomicas() {
                    let TallaS = document.querySelectorAll(".cell-reco .column-S .fare-comparison-column .characteristic .ff-attribute-mileageAcrual .container-description .ff-attribute-inc")
                    let TallaM = document.querySelectorAll(".cell-reco .column-M .fare-comparison-column .characteristic .ff-attribute-mileageAcrual .container-description .ff-attribute-inc")
                    let TallaL = document.querySelectorAll(".cell-reco .column-L .fare-comparison-column .characteristic .ff-attribute-mileageAcrual .container-description .ff-attribute-inc")
                    let index;
                    for (index = 0; index < TallaS.length; index++) {
                        TallaS[index].innerHTML = TextS[lang]
                    }
                    for (index = 0; index < TallaM.length; index++) {
                        TallaM[index].innerHTML = TextM[lang]
                    }
                    for (index = 0; index < TallaL.length; index++) {
                        TallaL[index].innerHTML = TextL[lang]
                    }
                }

                function TallasEjecutivas() {

                    let TallaXL = document.querySelectorAll(".cell-reco .column-XL .fare-comparison-column .characteristic .ff-attribute-mileageAcrual .container-description .ff-attribute-inc")
                    let TallaXXL = document.querySelectorAll(".cell-reco .column-XXL .fare-comparison-column .characteristic .ff-attribute-mileageAcrual .container-description .ff-attribute-inc")
                    let index;
                    for (index = 0; index < TallaXL.length; index++) {
                        TallaXL[index].innerHTML = TextXL[lang]
                    }
                    for (index = 0; index < TallaXXL.length; index++) {
                        TallaXXL[index].innerHTML = TextXXL[lang]
                    }
                }

                function CicloS() {
                    let buttonS = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-container-row .cell-reco .column-S .bound-table-cell-reco")
                    for (let j = 0; j < buttonS.length; j++) {
                        buttonS[j].addEventListener("click", function () {

                            setTimeout(
                                function () {
                                    TallasEconomicas()
                                    CicloM()
                                    CicloL()
                                }, 3500)

                        }, 3000);
                    }
                }

                function CicloM() {
                    let buttonM = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-container-row .cell-reco .column-M .bound-table-cell-reco")

                    for (let x = 0; x < buttonM.length; x++) {
                        buttonM[x].addEventListener("click", function () {

                            setTimeout(
                                function () {
                                    TallasEconomicas()
                                    CicloS()
                                    CicloL()
                                }, 3500)

                        }, 3000);
                    }
                }

                function CicloL() {

                    let buttonL = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-container-row .cell-reco .column-L .bound-table-cell-reco")

                    for (let z = 0; z < buttonL.length; z++) {
                        buttonL[z].addEventListener("click", function () {

                            setTimeout(
                                function () {
                                    TallasEconomicas()
                                    CicloS()
                                    CicloM()
                                }, 3500)

                        }, 3000);

                    }
                }

                function CicloXL() {

                    let buttonXL = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-container-row .cell-reco .column-XL .bound-table-cell-reco")


                    for (let w = 0; w < buttonXL.length; w++) {
                        buttonXL[w].addEventListener("click", function () {

                            setTimeout(
                                function () {
                                    TallasEjecutivas()
                                    CicloXXL()
                                }, 3500)

                        }, 3000);
                    }
                }

                function CicloXXL() {

                    let buttonXXL = document.querySelectorAll(".fare-container-row .cell-reco .column-XXL .bound-table-cell-reco")

                    for (let r = 0; r < buttonXXL.length; r++) {
                        buttonXXL[r].addEventListener("click", function () {

                            setTimeout(
                                function () {
                                    TallasEjecutivas()
                                    CicloXL()
                                }, 3500)

                        }, 3000);
                    }
                }

                if (desk) {

                    let cbox1 = document.querySelectorAll(".upsell-bound .bound-table-flightline .fare-group-header:nth-of-type(1)")
                    let cbox2 = document.querySelectorAll(".upsell-bound .bound-table-flightline .fare-group-header:nth-of-type(2)")

                    function Proccess() {


                        /// Tallas Economica
                        if (cbox1 != null) {
                            for (let i = 0; i < cbox1.length; i++) {
                                cbox1[i].addEventListener("click", function () {
                                    setTimeout(
                                        function () {
                                            TallasEconomicas()
                                            CicloS()
                                            CicloM()
                                            CicloL()

                                        }, 3500)


                                }, 3000);
                            }


                        }

                        /// Tallas Ejecutivas


                        if (cbox2 != null) {
                            for (let i = 0; i < cbox2.length; i++) {
                                cbox2[i].addEventListener("click", function () {

                                    setTimeout(
                                        function () {
                                            TallasEjecutivas()
                                            CicloXL()
                                            CicloXXL()
                                        }, 3500)

                                }, 3000);
                            }

                        }

                    }

                    /*
                    function buttonProccess(){
                        let button = document.querySelector(".plnext-widget-btn")
                        button.addEventListener("click", function(){ 
                
                                console.log("HELLO")
                           
                            },6000)
                        
                    } */

                    // buttonProccess()
                    Proccess()


                } else if (mobile) {

                    /// Tallas Economica


                    let cbox1 = document.querySelectorAll(".upsell-bound .bound-table-flightline .fare-group-header:nth-of-type(1)")
                    if (cbox1 != null) {
                        for (let i = 0; i < cbox1.length; i++) {
                            cbox1[i].addEventListener("click", function () {
                                setTimeout(
                                    function () {
                                        TallasEconomicas()
                                        CicloS()
                                        CicloM()
                                        CicloL()

                                    }, 3500)


                            }, 3000);
                        }


                    }

                    /// Tallas Ejecutivas

                    let cbox2 = document.querySelectorAll(".upsell-bound .bound-table-flightline .fare-group-header:nth-of-type(2)")

                    if (cbox2 != null) {
                        for (let i = 0; i < cbox2.length; i++) {
                            cbox2[i].addEventListener("click", function () {

                                setTimeout(
                                    function () {
                                        TallasEjecutivas()
                                        CicloXL()
                                        CicloXXL()
                                    }, 3500)

                            }, 3000);
                        }

                    }
                }
            }
        }

        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
        }

        preload(0);
    })();
</script><style>
  
    @media screen and (min-width: 1025px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 1024px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 767px) {}

    @media screen and (max-width: 500px) {}

    (function () {

        let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 767 ? 'des' : 'mob';

	const flujo = "NBF";

        const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

        const numScript = "[FB116]";

        console.log(numScript);

        var textos = {
	es: "Recuerda que para modificar tu reserva los campos de contacto y correo electrónico deben estar completos o modifícalos con el <strong>botón editar</strong>.",
	en: "Remember that you can modify your booking when the contact and e-mail fields are complete. You can modify them with <strong>edit button</strong>.",
	pt: "Lembre-se que para modificar a sua reserva, os campos de contacto e e-mail devem estar completos ou modificá-los com o <strong>botão de edição</strong>."
	}

        const preload = (maxIntents) => {
            setTimeout(() => {
                if (document.querySelector(".form-global-error")) {
                    modifyPage();
                    reviewLang();

                }
                else if (maxIntents == 275) {
                    //console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
                }
                else {
                    maxIntents++;
                    preload(maxIntents);
                }
            }, 300);
        }

        const modifyPage = () => {

           let lang = getLang();
       
	   document.querySelector(".form-global-error").remove();
	   document.querySelector(".no-ATC-Rebooking-Message").innerHTML = textos[lang];
	   document.querySelector(".no-ATC-Rebooking-Message").classList = "";
       document.querySelector(".additional-options-modify-services").remove();
		
       let elemento  = document.querySelector(".plnext-message-info");
       let elementon_clon = elemento.cloneNode(true);
       elemento.remove();
       document.querySelector(".heading").append(elementon_clon);
       
       if(device == "mob"){
        elementon_clon.style.setProperty("margin-top","0","important"); 
        elementon_clon.style.marginBottom = "20px";
       }
          
       }
        
        const getLang = () => {
            return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").toLowerCase();
        }

        const getPageID = () => {
            return document.querySelector("body").getAttribute("data-template-name");
        }

        preload(0);

    })();
</script><style>
  .last-search-title {
    font-weight: 700;
    margin: 0 0 16px 10px;
  }
  .last-search-container {
    display: flex;
    margin: 0 0 2rem 10px;
  }
  .last-search-card {
    display: flex;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgb(225 223 223);
    width: max-content; padding: 0 12px;
    border-radius: 6px;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-right: 16px;
    transition: all 0.4s ease;
  }
  .last-search-card:hover {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgb(183 183 183);
    transform: scale(1.05);
    transition: all 0.4s ease;
  }
  .flight-details {
    display: flex;
    text-decoration: none;
    color: #323237;
  }
  .flight-details:hover {
    text-decoration: none;
  }

    margin: 6px 0;
  }
  .flight-arrow {
    padding: 2px 10px 0;
  }

  .return-day {

    padding-top: 2px;

  }

    padding: 2px 0 0 4px;

    padding: 2px 0 0;
    cursor: pointer;
    margin: 6px 0 0 16px;
  }
  .departure-day::before,
  .number-passengers::before {
    content: '';
    height: 5px;
    width: 5px;
    background-color: #505055;
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0px 10px 2px;
  }
  
  @media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
  .last-search-title-mobile,
  .last-search-mobile-container {
    display: none !important;

</style><script>
(function () {

  let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1024 ? 'des' : 'mob';

  const type = "1"; // | "0_control";
  const interaccion = "int";

  const flujo = "DX"; // DX || NBF
  const analitycsElem = (flujo == "NBF" ? "dataLayer" : "gtmDt");

  const numScript = "[PER-LastSearch]";

  if (type == 0) console.log(numScript, "Control");
  if (type == 1) console.log(numScript, "Experiencia");
  if (type == 2) console.log(numScript, "Version C");

  var sitePath = window.location.pathname;
  var getPointOfSale = sitePath.split('/');
  var setPoinfOfSale = getPointOfSale[1].toUpperCase();
  var siteLanguage = getPointOfSale[2].toUpperCase();
  var getLastSearchData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('lastSearch'));

  // Position[0] from desktop - Position[1] for mobile
  var roundTripRadioButton = document.querySelectorAll('#radioIdayVuelta')
  var oneWayTripRadioButton = document.querySelectorAll('#radioSoloIda')

  var departureDateInput = document.getElementsByName('pbFechaIda') // Position[0] for rounded trips - Position[1] for one way trip
  var returnDateInput = document.getElementsByName('pbFechaRegreso')

  // Position[0] for rounded trip - Position[1] for one way trip
  var searchFlightBtn = document.querySelectorAll('.btn.primary.btn-codepromo.pull-btn.rojo')

  if(device === 'des' && (siteLanguage === 'ES' || siteLanguage === 'EN')) {
    function setVuelo() {
      var existingData = getLastSearchData;
      let dataIndex = 0;
      if(existingData === null) {
        existingData = [];
      } else if (existingData.length > 0) {
        if (existingData[0].index === 0) {
          dataIndex = 1;
        }
        dataIndex;
      }
  
      var originInput = document.querySelector('input.pbOrigen')
      var originAirportLabel = document.querySelector('input.pbOrigen').nextSibling
  
      var destinationInput = document.querySelector('input.pbDestino')
      var destinationAirportLabel = document.querySelector('input.pbDestino').nextSibling
  
      // Important: this elements is created when click on passengers input
      // The order depends on the first item selected by type of flight.
      var passengersModals = document.querySelectorAll('.passenger.x-plugin.float');
  
      // Position[1] for departure date - Position[2] for return date
      var calendarDesktop = document.querySelectorAll('.nombre.x-plugin')[1];
      var calendarDesktop2 = document.querySelectorAll('.nombre.x-plugin')[2];

      var getDates = calendarDesktop.querySelectorAll('.day-selected');
      var getOneWayDate = calendarDesktop2.querySelectorAll('.day-selected');
      
      if(passengersModals.length === 0) {
        var adultsQty = 1;
        var childsQty = 0;
        var infantsQty = 0;
      } else {
        var adultsQty = passengersModals[0].querySelector('.controls.adults .value').innerHTML;
      
        // Positon[0] for childs - Position[1] for infants
        var noadultsQty = passengersModals[0].querySelectorAll('.controls.noadults .value');
      
        var childsQty = noadultsQty[0].innerHTML;
        var infantsQty = noadultsQty[1].innerHTML;
      }
  
      var totalPassengers = +adultsQty + +childsQty + +infantsQty;
  
      if(roundTripRadioButton[0].checked && originInput.value !== '' && destinationInput.value !== '' && departureDateInput[0].value !== '' && returnDateInput[0].value !== '') {
        var departureDate = getDates[0].getAttribute('data-day');
        var returnDate = getDates[1].getAttribute('data-day');
  
        data = {
          'index': dataIndex,
          'ciudadOrigen': originInput.value,
          'aeropuertoOrigen' : originAirportLabel.value,
          'ciudadDestino': destinationInput.value,
          'aeropuertoDestino' : destinationAirportLabel.value,
          'fechaSalida': departureDate,
          'fechaRegreso': returnDate,
          'cantAdults': +adultsQty,
          'cantChilds': +childsQty,
          'cantInfants': +infantsQty,
          'cantTotal': totalPassengers,
        }
      }
  
      if(oneWayTripRadioButton[0].checked && originInput.value !== '' && destinationInput.value !== '' && departureDateInput[0].value !== '') {
        var departureDate = getOneWayDate[0].getAttribute('data-day');
  
        data = {
          'index': dataIndex,
          'ciudadOrigen': originInput.value,
          'aeropuertoOrigen' : originAirportLabel.value,
          'ciudadDestino': destinationInput.value,
          'aeropuertoDestino' : destinationAirportLabel.value,
          'fechaSalida': departureDate,
          'cantAdults': +adultsQty,
          'cantChilds': +childsQty,
          'cantInfants': +infantsQty,
          'cantTotal': totalPassengers,
        }
      }
  
      existingData.unshift(data)
      if(existingData.length > 2) {
        existingData.pop();
      }
      localStorage.setItem('lastSearch', JSON.stringify(existingData));
    }
  
    searchFlightBtn.forEach(function(el){
      el.addEventListener('click', setVuelo);
    })
  
    if(getLastSearchData && getLastSearchData.length > 0) {
      var searchURL = 'https://booking.avianca.com/av/booking/avail';

      const currentDate = new Date();
      currentDate.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
      const getNumberOfDays = (start, end) => {
        const date1 = new Date(start);
        const date2 = new Date(end);
    
        // One day in milliseconds
        const oneDay = 1000 * 60 * 60 * 24;
    
        // Calculating the time difference between two dates
        const diffInTime = date2.getTime() - date1.getTime();
    
        // Calculating the no. of days between two dates
        const diffInDays = Math.round(diffInTime / oneDay);
    
        return diffInDays;
      }

      // Add X days to a date
      Date.prototype.addDays = function (days) {
        const date = new Date(this.valueOf());
        date.setDate(date.getDate() + days);
        return date;
      }
  
      const lastSearchTitle = document.createElement('h5');
      lastSearchTitle.classList.add('last-search-title');
      if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
        lastSearchTitle.innerText = 'Tus últimas búsquedas:';
      }
      if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
        lastSearchTitle.innerText = 'Your last searches:';
      }
  
      document.querySelector('.bookingHome').appendChild(lastSearchTitle);
  
      var lastSearchContainer = document.createElement('article');
      lastSearchContainer.classList.add('last-search-container');
  
      var months = {
        "1": "01",
        "2": "02",
        "3": "03",
        "4": "04",
        "5": "05",
        "6": "06",
        "7": "07",
        "8": "08",
        "9": "09",
        "10": "10",
        "11": "11",
        "12": "12",
      }
  
      if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
        var monthsES = {
          "1": "ene",
          "2": "feb",
          "3": "mar",
          "4": "abr",
          "5": "may",
          "6": "jun",
          "7": "jul",
          "8": "ago",
          "9": "sep",
          "10": "oct",
          "11": "nov",
          "12": "dic",
        }
      }
  
      if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
        var monthsEN = {
          "1": "jan",
          "2": "feb",
          "3": "mar",
          "4": "apr",
          "5": "may",
          "6": "jun",
          "7": "jul",
          "8": "aug",
          "9": "sep",
          "10": "oct",
          "11": "nov",
          "12": "dec",
        }
      }
  
      for(el of getLastSearchData) {
        // Change POS
        /*if(setPoinfOfSale === 'OTR' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'NI' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'BO' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'DO' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'GT' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'PA' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'UY' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'SV' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'HN' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'PY' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'CL' ||
            setPoinfOfSale === 'PE'
            ) {
          setPoinfOfSale = 'US';
        }*/

        if(el.fechaRegreso) {
          var dateOfReturn = new Date(el.fechaRegreso);
        }

        // Validate if a date is a past date and add 7 days to it
        if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, el.fechaSalida) < 0 && getNumberOfDays(currentDate, dateOfReturn) < 1 ) {
          let updateDepartureDate = currentDate.addDays(7);
          updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.toLocaleDateString();
          updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.split('/');
          var departureYear = updateDepartureDate[2];
          var departureMonth = updateDepartureDate[1];
          var departureDay = updateDepartureDate[0];
          if(departureDay.length === 1) {
            departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
          }
          var departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
        } else if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, el.fechaSalida) < 0) {
          let updateDepartureDate = currentDate;
          updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.toLocaleDateString();
          updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.split('/');
          var departureYear = updateDepartureDate[2];
          var departureMonth = updateDepartureDate[1];
          var departureDay = updateDepartureDate[0];
          if(departureDay.length === 1) {
            departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
          }
          var departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
        } else {
          var getDepartureDate = el.fechaSalida.split('.');
          var departureYear = getDepartureDate[0];
          var departureMonth = getDepartureDate[1];
          var departureDay = getDepartureDate[2];
          if(departureDay.length === 1) {
            departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
          }
          var departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
        }
  
        if(!el.fechaRegreso) {
          if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, el.fechaSalida) < 0) {
            let updateDepartureDate = currentDate.addDays(7);
            updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.toLocaleDateString();
            updateDepartureDate = updateDepartureDate.split('/');
            var departureYear = updateDepartureDate[2];
            var departureMonth = updateDepartureDate[1];
            var departureDay = updateDepartureDate[0];
            if(departureDay.length === 1) {
              departureDay = '0' + departureDay;
            }
            var departureDate = departureYear + '-' + months[departureMonth] + '-' + departureDay;
          }
          var searchURLQuery = '?departureDate=' + departureDate + '&tripType=one-way&from=' + el.aeropuertoOrigen + '&to=' + el.aeropuertoDestino+ '&nbAdults=' + el.cantAdults + '&nbChildren=' +el.cantChilds + '&nbInfants=' + el.cantInfants + '&language=' + siteLanguage + '&platform=WEBB2C&pointOfSale=' + setPoinfOfSale + '&promoCode=&negoFare=&overrides=%7B%22enableFlexCancelTeaser%22:%22true%22,%22useHPP%22:%22true%22%7D&accessMethod=default&backend=PRD';
        } else {
          if(getNumberOfDays(currentDate, dateOfReturn) < 1) {
            let updateReturnDate = currentDate.addDays(14);
            updateReturnDate = updateReturnDate.toLocaleDateString();
            updateReturnDate = updateReturnDate.split('/');
            var returnYear = updateReturnDate[2];
            var returnMonth = updateReturnDate[1];
            var returnDay = updateReturnDate[0];
            if(returnDay.length === 1) {
              var returnDay = '0' + returnDay;
            }
            var returnDate = returnYear + '-' + months[returnMonth] + '-' + returnDay;
    
            var searchURLQuery = '?departureDate=' + departureDate + '&tripType=round-trip&from=' + el.aeropuertoOrigen + '&to=' + el.aeropuertoDestino+ '&nbAdults=' + el.cantAdults + '&nbChildren=' +el.cantChilds + '&nbInfants=' + el.cantInfants + '&language=' + siteLanguage + '&platform=WEBB2C&pointOfSale=' + setPoinfOfSale + '&returnDate=' + returnDate + '&promoCode=&negoFare=&overrides=%7B%22enableFlexCancelTeaser%22:%22true%22,%22useHPP%22:%22true%22%7D&accessMethod=default&backend=PRD';
          } else {
            var getReturnDate = el.fechaRegreso.split('.');
            var returnYear = getReturnDate[0];
            var returnMonth = getReturnDate[1];
            var returnDay = getReturnDate[2];
            if(returnDay.length === 1) {
              var returnDay = '0' + returnDay;
            }
            var returnDate = returnYear + '-' + months[returnMonth] + '-' + returnDay;
    
            var searchURLQuery = '?departureDate=' + departureDate + '&tripType=round-trip&from=' + el.aeropuertoOrigen + '&to=' + el.aeropuertoDestino+ '&nbAdults=' + el.cantAdults + '&nbChildren=' +el.cantChilds + '&nbInfants=' + el.cantInfants + '&language=' + siteLanguage + '&platform=WEBB2C&pointOfSale=' + setPoinfOfSale + '&returnDate=' + returnDate + '&promoCode=&negoFare=&overrides=%7B%22enableFlexCancelTeaser%22:%22true%22,%22useHPP%22:%22true%22%7D&accessMethod=default&backend=PRD';
          }
        }
  
        var htmlCard = document.createElement('div');
        htmlCard.setAttribute('id', 'htmlCard-'+el.index );
        htmlCard.classList.add('last-search-card');
  
        var cardFlightDetails = document.createElement('a');
        cardFlightDetails.setAttribute('href', searchURL+searchURLQuery );
        cardFlightDetails.setAttribute('role', 'link' );
        cardFlightDetails.classList.add('flight-details');
  
        var originCity = document.createElement('p');
        originCity.classList.add('origin-city');
        originCity.innerText = el.ciudadOrigen;
  
        var flightArrow = document.createElement('p');
        flightArrow.classList.add('flight-arrow');
        flightArrow.innerHTML = "<svg width='16' height='16' viewBox='0 0 16 16' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path d='M10.673 7.333H2.667v1.334h8.006v2L13.333 8l-2.66-2.667v2z' fill='#323237'></path></svg>";
  
        var destinationCity = document.createElement('p');
        destinationCity.classList.add('destination-city');
        destinationCity.innerText = el.ciudadDestino;
  
        var departureDateInfo = document.createElement('p');
        departureDateInfo.classList.add('departure-day');
        if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
          departureDateInfo.innerText = departureDay + ' ' + monthsES[departureMonth];
        }
        if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
          departureDateInfo.innerText = departureDay + ' ' + monthsEN[departureMonth];
        }
  
        var lineSeparator = document.createElement('p');
        lineSeparator.classList.add('line-separator');
        lineSeparator.innerText = ' - ' ;
  
        var returnDateInfo = document.createElement('p');
        returnDateInfo.classList.add('return-day');
        if(siteLanguage === 'ES') {
          returnDateInfo.innerText = returnDay + ' ' + monthsES[returnMonth];
        }
        if(siteLanguage === 'EN') {
          returnDateInfo.innerText = returnDay + ' ' + monthsEN[returnMonth];
        }
        
        var numPassengers = document.createElement('p');
        numPassengers.classList.add('number-passengers');
        numPassengers.innerText = el.cantTotal;
  
        var passengersIcon = document.createElement('p');
        passengersIcon.classList.add('passengers-icon');
        passengersIcon.innerHTML = '<svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="#505055" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="M8 8a2.667 2.667 0 1 0 0-5.333A2.667 2.667 0 0 0 8 8zm0 1.333c-1.78 0-5.333.894-5.333 2.667v1.333h10.666V12c0-1.773-3.553-2.667-5.333-2.667z" fill="#323237"></path></svg>';
  
        var deleteFligthIcon = document.createElement('p');
        deleteFligthIcon.classList.add('delete-flight-icon');
        deleteFligthIcon.innerHTML = '<svg style="pointer-events: none" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="#505055" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="m12.667 4.273-.94-.94L8 7.06 4.274 3.333l-.94.94L7.06 8l-3.726 3.727.94.94L8 8.94l3.727 3.727.94-.94L8.94 8l3.727-3.727z" fill="#1B1B1B"></path><mask id="a" style="mask-type:alpha" maskUnits="userSpaceOnUse" x="3" y="3" width="10" height="10"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="m12.667 4.273-.94-.94L8 7.06 4.274 3.333l-.94.94L7.06 8l-3.726 3.727.94.94L8 8.94l3.727 3.727.94-.94L8.94 8l3.727-3.727z" fill="#fff"></path></mask></svg>'
        
        cardFlightDetails.appendChild(originCity);
        cardFlightDetails.appendChild(flightArrow);
        cardFlightDetails.appendChild(destinationCity);
        cardFlightDetails.appendChild(departureDateInfo);
        if(el.fechaRegreso) {
          cardFlightDetails.appendChild(lineSeparator);
          cardFlightDetails.appendChild(returnDateInfo);
        }
        cardFlightDetails.appendChild(numPassengers);
        cardFlightDetails.appendChild(passengersIcon);
        
        htmlCard.appendChild(cardFlightDetails);
        htmlCard.appendChild(deleteFligthIcon);
  
        lastSearchContainer.appendChild(htmlCard);
        document.querySelector('.bookingHome').appendChild(lastSearchContainer);
      }
  
      var deleteBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.delete-flight-icon');
      deleteBtns.forEach(function(el) {
        if(!el.classList.contains('cro-assigned')) {
          el.classList.add('cro-assigned');
          el.addEventListener('click', function(el) {
            trackEvents('last-search-close-click');
            el.target.parentNode.style.display = 'none';
            getLastSearchData = getLastSearchData.filter(data => ('htmlCard-'+data.index) !== el.target.parentNode.id)
            localStorage.setItem('lastSearch', JSON.stringify(getLastSearchData));
            
            if(getLastSearchData.length === 0) {
              document.querySelector('.last-search-title').remove();
            }
          })
        }
      })

      document.querySelectorAll('.flight-details').forEach(card => {
        if(!card.classList.contains('cro-assigned')){
          card.classList.add('cro-assigned');
          card.addEventListener('click', (el) => {
            trackEvents('last-search-item-click');
            el.stopPropagation();
          })
        }
      })
  
      var cantLastFlightContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.last-search-container');
      if(cantLastFlightContainers.length > 1) {
        cantLastFlightContainers[1].remove();
      }
      if(cantLastFlightContainers.length == 0) {
        document.querySelector('.last-search-title').remove();
      }
  
      var cantLastSearchTitles = document.querySelectorAll('.last-search-title');
      if(cantLastSearchTitles.length > 1) {
        cantLastSearchTitles[1].remove();
      }
  
    }
  }

  const trackEvents = (identificador) => {
    const pushClickanalitycs = e => { let t = "AT_463454_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " ANALITYCS: ", t), window[analitycsElem].push({ event: "sendTargetEvent", target_action: t }) }, trackEvent = (e, t) => { let a = "AT_463454_" + device + "_" + interaccion + "_" + type + "_" + e; console.log(numScript, " MBOX: ", a), adobe.target.getOffer({ mbox: a, type: type, params: { ATFunctionName: "adobe.target.getOffer", campaignId: "463454", "audienceReport_463454": !1 }, success: () => { "function" == typeof t && t() }, error: (e, t) => { console.error("conv -> trackEvent Request failed", e, t) } }) };

    try { trackEvent(identificador, "click"); } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to adobe: ", error); }
    try { pushClickanalitycs(identificador) } catch (error) { console.error(numScript, " Error pushing to analitycs: ", error); }
  }

})();
</script><script>
(function () {

    let device = document.querySelector("html").offsetWidth >= 1025 ? 'des' : 'mob';

    const numScript = "[FB172]";

    console.log(numScript);


    const preload = (maxIntents) => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            if (document.querySelector("#mainContent_Ir_Codigo_reserva")) {
                modify();
            }
            else if (maxIntents == 75) {
                console.warn(numScript, "Elem didn't load");
            }
            else {
                maxIntents++;
                preload(maxIntents);
            }

        }, 300);
    }

    const modify = () => {

        let idioma = lang()

        const copysNew = {
            es: "<span style='font-weight:normal;'><strong>¿No puedes hacer check-in online?</strong> Conoce <a target='_blank' style='font-weight:bold;text-decoration:underline;color:#bf0006;' href='https://help.avianca.com/hc/es-419/articles/4407660149019--Por-qu%C3%A9-no-puedo-hacer-check-in-online-'>aquí</a> las posibles razones y qué puedes hacer para solucionarlo.</span>",

            en: "<span style='font-weight:normal;'><strong>Can't check-in online?</strong> Find out <a target='_blank' style='font-weight:bold;text-decoration:underline;color:#bf0006;' href='https://help.avianca.com/hc/en-us/articles/4407660149019--Por-qu%C3%A9-no-puedo-hacer-check-in-online-'>here</a> the possible reasons and ways to solve it.</span>",

            pt: "<span style='font-weight:normal;'><strong>Não pode fazer o check in online?</strong> Descubra <a target='_blank' style='font-weight:bold;text-decoration:underline;color:#bf0006;' href='https://help.avianca.com/hc/pt/articles/4407660149019--Por-qu%C3%A9-no-puedo-hacer-check-in-online-'>aquí</a> as razões possíveis e o que pode fazer para o resolver.</span>"
        }

        let button = document.querySelector("#mainContent_Ir_Codigo_reserva");

        button.addEventListener("click", function () {
            console.log("BUTTON CLICK")
            setTimeout(function () {
                let elem = document.querySelector("#WebCheckinForm .alert.alert-danger.dataError");
                if (elem.style.display != "none") {
                    elem.querySelector("h3").remove();
                    elem.querySelector("span").style.paddingLeft = 0;
                    elem.querySelector("span").innerHTML = copysNew[idioma];
                }
            }, 1500)
        });


    }



    const lang = () => {
        return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("lang").split("-")[0].toLowerCase();
    }

    const getPageID = () => {
        return document.querySelector("html").getAttribute("cro-pag");
    }

    preload(0);
})();
